name: Phiware Voice
author: Daniele Madama

sections.description:
Phiware Voice service has the objective to offer automatic, natural
text to speech conversion, as a service over the web, using synthetic voices (TTS – Text-to-Speech).
At present, we offer a service that generates the audio version of your web site’s pages, improving their
accessibility and helping people who may have difficulty in reading the contents by themselves, or who simply
prefer listening.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the archive content and upload phiwarevoice directorory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to settings page, add your Customer Name. Eventually change other settings N.B.: If you don’t have a Customer Name visit Phiware Voice site
sections.faq: If you need more help please visit Phiware Voice site
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • Integration with Mystique theme

0.2

  • Now you can use a link or form mode (link is preferred)

0.1

  • First release.
